website_summaries.verdict: Saves on depth and has a nice modern look.
pros: A beautiful sink that is good for a narrow bathroom
It is sturdy and stylish with a nice design

customer_reviews.title: Works Out Great
customer_reviews.text: I had a little flush in my basement and the area was just large enough to put this sink and still leave leg room. The packing is unbelievable--trust me when I say it will not arrive broken because the contractor had to get it out of the box. A friend so how nice it was and converted the first floor closet of her row home into a powder and it worked out great. For the women out there who just look at the picture--you must purchase the faucet separately.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw — do not buy
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the photo does not accurately reflect the product. The soap drainage is on the LEFT, along with the faucet hole, so you can’t mount a faucet properly. I’ve had two different plumbers look at this, and now I’m left with a poorly-designed sink that I can’t use.
customer_reviews.author: San Francisco feet

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: The most adorable little sink! PERFECT for a tiny 1/2 bath. Negative: No overflow. Not sure I would have gotten if I had kids.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but perfect! (that's what she said)
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled our bathroom and added this tiny sink. The bathroom did not have a sink before, as many don't in San Francisco. See picture for sizing reference.
customer_reviews.author: DaniMahoney

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the picture does not describe the product. All the parts are not shown is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Kutay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful replacement for our cheap plastic corner sink in our ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful replacement for our cheap plastic corner sink in our motorhome. Since it is wall-hung, I cut down a store-bought vanity cabinet and made a countertop out of a bamboo cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman

customer_reviews.title: whitehaus sink
customer_reviews.text: It was the size I expected and of excellent quality. Was also promptly delivered. It was also packed safely and came undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Great things come in small packages
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling little sink for my very small half-bath. It fits perfectly into a 19 inch alcove and does not stick out into the main room. great product for a small bath.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Disclaimer: Product not as shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sink for a very tiny bathroom due to depth being less than 8". I returned the sink because, despite the photograph, the soap drain section was on the same side (left side) as the faucet hole. I couldn't use the right hand faucet location, so no swap and no Whitehaus sink.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Sink Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome small sink, easy to mount and works like a sink should.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This was put into a very small bathroom. Works great, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brent C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scale was perfect for my needs, quality was great....included mounting hardware worked as designed.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaged poorly.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sink to fit in a very small powder. It would of been perfect if it was packaged correctly. It was delivered in the box it came in with no protective bubble wrap or anything. It was completely smashed into all types of pieces. I couldn't even get a good idea on how it would work to see if I wanted another one. Note to self: Order porcelan products through a reputable company that packages correctly .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Olcese

product_meta.title: Whitehaus WH1-103L-WH Isabella 17-1/2-Inch Small Wall-Mount Lavatory Basin with Center Drain and Left-Hand Faucet Drilling, White
product_meta.description:
Whitehaus Collection displays high levels of sophistication and serenity with the Isabella Collection. Crafted from the highest quality vitreous china available, these basins are as durable as they are luxurious. The Isabella Collection is offered in a variety of shapes and sizes. The smooth, seamless design creates a modern, contemporary focal point, making it the perfect choice for any dÃ cor. Complement any decor with this small wall mount basin with center drain and left hole drill. Available in white only. Sink does not have an overflow.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Whitehaus Collection has been raising the bar in the decorative arena for over ten years by providing high-end decorative plumbing fixtures that range in design from modern to eastern-influenced to traditional. Our products are not only aesthetically pleasing, they are finely crafted to withstand the test of time, children, guests, and other forces. Whitehaus Collection is your source for original designs and imports of quality decorative plumbing fixtures to be found in the kitchen and bath. From traditional to contemporary design, we bring to you a broad selection of styles and finishes for sinks, faucets, and accessories.
